data.title: Nova Crystallis
data.meta_description: Gaming news, reviews, previews, and coverage from around the world focused around Square Enix
data.text:
Starting October 4, 2024, Foamstars will transition from a premium purchase to a free-to-play model for all players. Currently, those who subscribe to PlayStation Plus can play for free, while those who do not need to pay for the retail package. Square Enix's online multiplayer title features arena matches of varying types where characters that can shoot others with foam and surf over it as it builds in volume. Players who purchase or download the game before October 4, 2024 will be given 12 exclusive "color-variant Bubble Beastie" skins, one exclusive Slide Board design, and one title: "Legacy". Details on redeeming these gifts will be shared later. Currently Foamstars just wrapped it's "Tropical Jackpot" season, which introduced a new "Jackpot Scramble" gameplay mode where players need to dash around the stage to grab coins dropped by a moving slot machine. Once a team claims a requisite number of course, they'll need to grab the victory bottle to win the match. The mode includes a dedicated map "Jackpot Square" which includes four different areas. The game, whether you purchase it at a premium or subscribe through PlayStation Plus, has ongoing battle passes that unlock in-game rewards including character skins and other cosmetic rewards. Foamstars is

Dragon Quest Monsters The Dark Prince will release on Steam and mobile devices on September 11, 2024. Previously launched last year on Nintendo Switch, the newest title in the monster-collecting spinoff series follows the events of Dragon Quest IV but through an antagonist's perspective. Psaro, a demon prince, has been cursed by his father to never be able to harm monsters. In order to take his revenge, he has become a Monster Wrangler, recruiting a legion of Dragon Quest series monsters to fight in his stead. Over 500 monsters are available to catch or fuse as Psaro travels through the many levels of Nadiria - each changing drastically in the four seasons. DLC from the Switch version's Digital Deluxe edition will be available, including The Mole Hole, Coach Joe's Dungeon Gym, and Treasure Trunks. You can catch the announcement trailer and Steam screenshots below. Announcement Trailer https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eVmSkriWgSw Steam Screenshots

With a handful of days left until Visions of Mana's release, Square Enix has shared more info about the characters and enemies you'll meet on your adventure. Chosen by the faeries to sacrifice themselves to the Mana Tree, "alms" are selected to go on a pilgrimage with "soul guards" to protect them. Val is one such soul guard, and his childhood friend Hinna is appointed as an alm. As they travel, they encounter others chosen as alms, recruiting them to their party. They'll also encounter the fearsome Benevodons, powerful and otherworldly beasts that are aligned with the eight elements. Elemental Aeries can be found across the world, where players can take on special challenges with certain rules to complete difficult trials. Visions of Mana will release August 29, 2024 on PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, and Steam. You can read our review of the PlayStation 5 version here. Square Enix shares the following: Story In Tianeea, the Fire Village, everyone is preparing for the coming of the Faerie and the naming of an “alm.” Every four years, alms from around the world are chosen to travel to the Tree of Mana and rejuvenate the flow of mana power by offering their souls. A

In Dragon Quest III HD2D Remake, the companions that the hero can recruit on their journey can now be customized in several ways. During today's Nintendo Direct Partner Showcase presentation, we get a brief glimpse of gameplay footage that allows players to customize a party member's name, vocation, appearance (hair color), and personality. The player can also select whether to play as a male or female presenting hero. We also learn that a new vocation will be added to the game not present in the original: the Monster Wrangler. This vocation uses monster-like abilities on friend or foe alike, and "a place where monsters can be put to use" was teased, briefly showing the hero encountering a slime. Pre-orders have opened today, which will gift players an in-game "Trouble-Free Travel Kit" with Elevating Shoes, Seed of Defence x3, Seed of Agility x3, Seed of Magic x3, Seed of Strength x3 and Seed of Life x3. Dragon Quest III HD2D Remake releases November 14, 2024 on PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, Microsoft Store and Steam. Dragon Quest III HD2D - Nintendo Direct 8/27 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pTL3CNuXAXg

The Mana series has seen something of a resurgence as of late with a return to form highlighted by the release of a remake in recent times. It’s been fifteen years since the last all-new entry, which is plenty of time to create something fresh for the franchise. Thus, we find ourselves with Visions of Mana – a game that promises to offer that fresh experience for returning fans while still creating something exciting for newcomers. Visions of Mana begins with the introduction of Tianeea, a village preparing for the coming of the Faerie and naming of something known as an “alm”. This alm is chosen to revive the Tree of Mana on a four-year basis by sacrificing their souls. But before all of this, the game eases into itself with a prologue of sorts, one that ends in tragedy, and shows us that the world isn’t as pleasant as its colorful designs make it seem. It’s following this tutorial that the story truly begins. Our main character, Val, is a soul guard - someone with a rare ability - who must accompany the chosen alm on their journey, but to his surprise it’s his friend Hinna who ends up getting chosen to

In Life is Strange Double Exposure, players assume the role of Max Caulfield, the protagonist of the first game in the series. Max is now a photographer-in-residence at Caledon University, and when her friend Safi is suddenly murdered, new powers awaken within her. Using the ability to shift between timelines where Safi lives or dies, Max needs to find the culprit before they strike again. In the trailer below, we get an extended look at how these powers function and impact the narrative. Max can move through environments and find items that only exist in one timeline. Since Safi's death is the centrifugal event, people will in different mental states in each timeline, and will help Max learn more about them or their potential motives. The game will visually represent which timeline Max is in, but the information she learns may help or hinder how she responds in certain situations. Life is Strange Double Exposure will release on October 29th, 2024 for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, and PC via Steam and the Windows Store. Pre-ordering the Ultimate Edition will allow you to play the game two weeks early on October 15th. A Nintendo Switch release is planned for a later announcement. Life

Square Enix has shared the final trailer for Visions of Mana ahead of its August 29, 2024 release. Coming to PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, and PC via Steam and the Windows Store, the action RPG is the latest entry in the Mana series stretching back over 30 years. The protagonist Val is a Soul Guard, tasked with guiding Hinna, the Alm of Fire, to the sacred Mana Tree. On this pilgrimage they will meet allies in other alms like Morley, Careena, Palamena, and Julei. Elemental spirits will allow the party to change their classes as well as use special traversal abilities to get around the game's maps. A playable demo is now available for free on all platforms. Final Trailer https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SubnfqC-vxk Demo Gameplay https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TmW1xbs3G5Q

The Rising limited-time seasonal event returns to Final Fantasy XIV from August 27th, 2024 through September 11th, 2024. Subtitled "Flowers bloom over the ocean, breathing the perfume of the past", a short scenario quest will be available in game with a variety of seasonal rewards. Limited time items from previous years' iterations of the event can also be purchased from the Online Store at a discount. Take a look at the event details below, and, while you're here, check out the details from the latest patch 7.05, which added the Savage difficulty tier of the Arcadion raid, a new treasure dungeon, job balances, and more. Also, the Moonfire Faire seasonal event is currently running through August 26th. "With fireworks in the air and festive decorations on every street corner, the season of summer is in full swing. So long as the sun shines bright, there is time yet for further merriment, and Costa del Sol's sandy beaches beckon... Bring your friends, family, and pets to revel and rampage at this year's Moonfire Faire!" Quest Rising to the Call Location: Speak to the Wandering Minstrel in Limsa Lominsa - Upper Decks. (X: 11.3, Y:13.7)Requires: Level 15, travel to Limsa Lominsa. "The wandering minstrel seeks an adventurer both

Square Enix will be partnering with Red Art Games to release Romancing SaGa Minstrel Song Remastered International early next year for PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, and Nintendo Switch. This release will include a physical version as well as a digital version. This version of the game will include, for the first time: French, Italian, German, and Spanish text. The 'Special Edition' of the game will include a reversible cover and a PVC keychain featuring artwork by Tomomi Kobayashi. The Collector's Edition will also include the reversible cover, a box with "retro-inspired" cover art (the Switch and PlayStation versions are different), steelcase, artbook, manual, and three postcards. Note that this is a separate version of the game, and language support for the 2022 'Remastered' edition will not be added. PlayStation 4 physical copies will only be available to purchase in Europe. This version of the game can be purchased through the VGP store. Akitoshi Kawazu,SaGa Series General Director “With the support of Red Art Games, we’re now able to release a new version of Romancing SaGa -Minstrel Song- Remastered that includes localization into French, German, Italian and Spanish languages. We are finally able to grant this desire of our loyal fans! We know there's a big
